content: DD-SA starting aid for core bits Starting aid for hand-held diamond core bits ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Accessories for tool inserts > Adapters and attachments- ### FEATURES:Features Fits all Hilti core bits for hand-held use: LM, HDMU, UCM, PCM, HWC The telescopic mechanism allows adjustment of the length of the starting aid to the length of the Hilti core bit in one simple step Easy, precise hole starting Virtually dustless drilling when used with a Hilti vacuum cleaner Applications Diamond drilling applications with hand-held tools ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Starting aids Technical Data | Accessory type | Starting aids ### ITEMS- 2122768 - Starting aid DD-SA 4-1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2122769 - Starting aid DD-SA 5 - Package Size 1 pc - 2069664 - Starting aid DD-SA 52 (2) - Package Size 1 pc - 2069667 - Starting aid DD-SA 2-1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2069669 - Starting aid DD-SA 3 - Package Size 1 pc - 2069902 - Starting aid DD-SA 3-1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2069903 - Starting aid DD-SA 4 - Package Size 1 pc - 2069908 - Starting aid DD-SA 152 - Package Size 1 pc
